name: Without Darkness
description:
Defeat enemies to gather essence. Offer your essence to the dark gods and delay the rising of the sun. How long can you last?

Controls:
Move: Arrow keys / WASD
Jump: Space
Shoot: L Ctrl / L Mouse
Use Altar: E / Right Mouse

Tools:
Sprite Editor: Aseprite
Game Engine: Unity 2021.1
Audio Editor: Audacity
Capture: ShareX

Audio Assets:

https://pixabay.com/sound-effects/impact-6291/ - Death Impact
https://pixabay.com/sound-effects/080960-shotgun-39745/ - Shotgun Reload
https://pixabay.com/sound-effects/080902-shotgun-39753/ - Shotgun Shot
https://pixabay.com/sound-effects/epic-battle-music-1-6275/ - Battle Music
https://pixabay.com/sound-effects/drama-cue-synth-and-cello-114417/ - Menu Music
https://darksideofsynth.com/sounds-patches.html#Beams (DSoS_WeaponBeam_Sound-Short_04) - Dark Essence Offering
